title: Instructional Competency Enhancement: Integrating ESP (English for Specific Purposes) Educational Technology in Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can combine ESP skills required in scientific practice (report writing, presentations, collaboration) with digital tools for practical application.

Learners independently study 10 ESP-related contents using mobile learning apps (Google Classroom, Edmodo, etc.) over four weeks, watch two flipped learning video lectures, write one summary blog post, and record/share one ESP educational topic presentation using podcast platforms (Anchor, Spotify, etc.)
Learners document and share the process of solving real scientific problems in English through project-based team activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
